text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few days after her scrimmage with<n>Tama Cross, I come
across Oguri Cap<n>at the height of an intense training<n>
session.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Phew... Okay, just one more set!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I watch as her feet gouge the ground,<n>propelling her
forward. There's no<n>doubt about it—those legs are a force<n>
to be reckoned with.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Engulfed by her zeal for training, I<n>lose track of time...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hm? Oh, it's you again.
choice_data_list: Nice work. Giving it your all, huh?
Nice work. Giving it your all, huh?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Yep. I'm actually gonna be<n>participating in the next tryout.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
The deadline to apply for the race had<n>already passed by
the time I had<n>transferred in.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
But after the race coordinators saw<n>the scrimmage between
me and<n>Tama, they decided to give me special<n>permission
to run in the next tryout.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
If I do well during tryouts, I'll be one<n>step closer to making
my central<n>debut. I need to push myself now<n>more than
ever before.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Oh right. Sorry to keep asking you, but<n>could you show me
the way one more<n>time?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Anywhere near the school, as long as<n>there's plenty of
nature.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I didn't know there was such a vast<n>forest behind the
academy. This is<n>perfect. Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh, yes. This is it. The forest air out<n>here is just right. It
cleanses my mind<n>and calms my soul.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Back in the day, I'd always find<n>myself running in these
areas.<n>Eventually, the folks back home<n>started suggesting
I run in an<n>Umamusume race.
choice_data_list: So that's how you started racing...
So that's how you started racing...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Yeah. It's thanks to everyone back<n>home and their support.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I remember when I ran in my first<n>regional race, the
townsfolk made me<n>a huge banner, even though they<n>
were really busy working the fields...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Whenever I had a race, everyone<n>would gather at the end of
the day and<n>feast in my name—win or lose.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
"What an amazing race!" "Watching<n>you run is always a
treat!" "Keep at it!"<n>...I was always surrounded by words<n>
of encouragement.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: That's why... I love running so much.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
And I love racing too. The bonds it<n>makes. The joy it brings.
I love it all.
choice_data_list:
You really care about the folks back home,
huh?

You really care about the folks back home,
huh?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Of course.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Everyone back home always says<n>that seeing me
race—seeing me run so<n>freely and happily—means the world<n>
to them.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: And my race with Tama wasreally fun. Just thinking about itgets my heart racing.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
If debuting means I get to run<n>alongside other amazing
racers as<n>strong and fast as Tama, then...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I want to debut as soon as possible.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even as she reminisces about the<n>past and contemplates
her present,<n>Oguri Cap's ambitions shine through<n>
brilliantly.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, that's enough chitchat for<n>today. I should get back
to my training.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for bringing me here. I'll<n>come to this forest to run
when I need<n>to clear my mind and remember my<n>roots.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'll be taking my leave. See you<n>around.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap announces her departure<n>and begins to walk
away. However,<n>as she does so—

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Ah.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She abruptly stops in her tracks and<n>crouches over.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hm? Why the sudden change of<n>expression?
choice_data_list: I thought you might be hurt...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: No... I'm fine. I just tore one of my<n>shoelaces, that's all.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I glance down at Oguri Cap's shoes,<n>and lo and behold,
they're worn down<n>to basically nothing.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: It's no big deal. All of my shoes wear<n>out quite quickly.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Gotta go buy a new pair again.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap ties the torn laces together<n>and once again sets
off.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The damage on her shoes was<n>nothing short of abnormal,
probably<n>because she runs with such<n>incredible force.
Normal shoes could<n>never withstand that kind of wear and<n>
tear.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap won't be able to realize her<n>fullest potential if she
keeps running in<n>those.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I have to do something about it.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Hmm, I see everything's as pricey as<n>ever.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Oh, hey. You're that new trainer,<n>yeah? The one always
hangin'<n>'round Oguri?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: What's with the long face? Ya tryna<n>find somethin'?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I tell Tamamo Cross about everything<n>that had happened.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Hm, I getcha. C'mon, how'd Oguri<n>not notice anything till
now? She sure<n>can be a ditz.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Anyway! I'll help ya out. Tryouts are<n>where ya go all out! It
wouldn't be fair<n>to the trainers or herself otherwise!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
A'ight, we're pickin' the toughest<n>shoes for her! Go big or
go home!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: No biggie. Always glad to help.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Besides, this isn't just for her. If she<n>doesn't hurry up and
debut, how am I<n>s'posed to race her again?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, let's get started! What's<n>your budget lookin' like?
Gotta know<n>that before we can do anythin' else.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With the help of Tamamo Cross, I<n>was able to pick out a
pair of shoes<n>that can withstand Oguri Cap's<n>power.
